entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
